keyword: protein style burger in n out calories
title: Calories in In-N-Out Protein Style Burger
meta_description: Discover protein style burger in n out calories: about 240 kcal per burger, plus full macros, sodium, and tweaks for variations like adding cheese.
h1: Calories in In-N-Out Protein Style Burger

query.item: protein style burger in n out

assumptions: In-N-Out Protein Style Hamburger: beef patty, lettuce wrap, tomato, onion, spread; no bun; standard menu item.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and preparation; values based on In-N-Out published data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out Protein Style Burger has ~240 kcal and ~16 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add cheese (make it Protein Style Cheeseburger)

faqs.q: How many calories in a protein style burger in n out?
faqs.a: About 240 kcal for the standard Protein Style Hamburger.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in In-N-Out Protein Style Burger?
Why is the Protein Style lower in carbs?
faqs.a: It uses lettuce instead of a bun, reducing carbs to ~4 g.

faqs.q: Does adding cheese change the calories much?
faqs.a: Yes, it adds ~50 kcal, making the total ~290 kcal.

faqs.q: How does sodium compare in Protein Style vs. regular?
faqs.a: Similar at ~600 mg, but no bun means slightly less overall.
